messages.title: THE QUESTION IS:
messages.content: Who can you rely on to battle for your hospital?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting local doctors and consultants, mobilising the local population against attempts to close key parts of Bassetlaw Hospital, and campaigning to re-open the childrenâ€™s ward overnight.
Backing proposals to restrict urban sprawl in Retford and instead have workable cross-party agreements to bring forward proposals for new villages to meet our housing needs.
Assisting local businesses like Icon Polymer to overcome obstacles and rebuild their factory, thus supporting job creation and enabling opportunities like bringing Marks & Spencer to Retford.

issues.education: I want every local child to have the opportunity to experience top level sport and I negotiate sponsorship to make that happen.
issues.health: I fought a hard campaign with the support of local people to keep the fire station in Retford.

housing.content: Backing proposals that restrict urban sprawl in Retford and insteaed have workable cross-party agreements to bring forward proposals for new villages to meet our housing needs.

leaflet.personalStatement: Putting Bassetlaw first has always been my way ahead of party loyalty throughout my political career.

politicalExperience.achievements: Running the only MP's veterans day for twelve years, supporting local businesses, working cross-party, and bringing Bassetlaw Day to Parliament.
